description: Get the water ready for the tea by boiling it.
name: Boil water
pseudocode: 1. Fill kettle with water. 2. Place kettle on stove. 3. Turn on stove. 4. Wait for water to boil. 5. Turn off stove.

description: Get the water ready for the tea by using a water boiler.
name: Use water boiler
pseudocode: 1. Fill the water boiler with water. 2. Turn on the water boiler. 3. Wait for the water boiler to finish. 4. The water is ready to be used.
